prompt: write whatever!
Write a letter to your eight year old self.
Dear future self...?
What makes a person good?
What's your own definition of happiness?
What worries you? Is it your control?
Write letters to friends and family member about things you can't to them in person.
Make a bucket list.
Describe the time you laughed the hardest.
What do you do to help people?
Describe what you are most proud of.
What matters? What doesn't?
Describe how you make important decisions.
How can you improve yourself?
Do you consider yourself trustworthy?
Name an aspect of your life over which you wish you had more control.
Are you shy or outgoing? Why do you think that is?
Describe some things you and a good friend have in common. Also describe some things that make you different.
What's a talent you wish you had? Why
What advice would you give to older people so they can become young at heart.
Write about your job, pets, your home, etc.
Make up an alter ego for yourself. Give them a name and then describe their qualities.
